connectedPersonbuttonYes.initial: Select if you are a connected person.

connectedPersonDetailedText.item: You're a connected person if you're not independent of your employer. For example, if you're a relative of the companyâ€™s owners, including by marriage or adoption. You're also a connected person if you're a specified shareholder as defined in Canada's Income Tax Act; or if you directly or indirectly own 10% or more of your employer's stock, or stock of a company related to your employer.

dpspAdditionalInfoPO.connectedPersonDisclaimer: Due to Canadian tax laws, you can't enrol in a DPSP if you're a connected person. Please go back and select a different plan.

planHeader.item: Since you've selected a DPSP, we need some additional information from you.

plansubHeader.item: You'll need to answer this question before continuing.

planProgressBarStep.item: Step 3 of 7: Add a bit more info
